title: Chicken Kottu
summary: A delicious blend of chopped roti, chicken, and spices.
description: Chicken Kottu is a popular street food in Sri Lanka, made by stir-frying chopped roti with chicken, vegetables, and spices.

title: Lamprais
description: Lamprais consists of rice, mixed meats, and sambol chili sauce, wrapped in a banana leaf and baked.

title: Red Pork Curry
description: Red Pork Curry is made with tender pork, cooked in a mixture of spices and chili, providing a hearty meal.

title: High Tea Package
description: Our High Tea Package includes a selection of fine teas, sandwiches, and pastries, perfect for an afternoon indulgence.

title: Thai Family Meal
summary: Family-sized meal serving traditional Thai dishes.
description: This family meal includes Thai green curry, pad Thai, spring rolls, and mango sticky rice, suitable for 2, 4, or 6 people.

title: Grilled Chicken Pizza
summary: Stone-baked pizza with grilled chicken toppings.
description: Enjoy our Grilled Chicken Pizza with a crispy crust, topped with grilled chicken, fresh mozzarella, and a hint of garlic and herbs.

title: Mocha Chocolate Cake
description: Our Mocha Chocolate Cake is a decadent dessert, combining rich chocolate and bold espresso flavors, topped with mocha ganache.

title: Pot Biriyani – Chicken
summary: Aromatic chicken biriyani cooked in a pot.
description: Our Chicken Pot Biriyani is slow-cooked with layers of marinated chicken, basmati rice, and traditional spices, served with raita and boiled egg.
